title: IT is a horror novel written by Stephen ...

messages.content: IT is a horror novel written by Stephen King in 1986
I'd like to learn about written. What should I know?
The story is set in Derry Maine and follows seven children called the Losers Club
I don't know much about children yet. Can you tell me about it?
Pennywise is an evil shapeshifting monster that appears as a clown
Shapeshifting is new to me. What is it?
Pennywise hunts children every 27 years in the town of Derry
I'm curious about children. What can you share?
Bill Denbrough is the leader of the Losers Club whose brother Georgie was killed by Pennywise
I'm curious about denbrough. What can you share?
I'm thinking about what you said. Tell me more?
Derry is new to me. What is it?
I don't know much about wrote yet. Can you tell me about it?
